meta.name: Generator
meta.content: Composite C1 CMS - Free Open Source from http://composite.net/

a.title: Thomas Edision Charter School, Wilmington Delaware

div.h1: Welcome to Thomas Edison Charter School

p.img: We are a tuition-free, K-8 public charter school in Delaware dedicated to educating and elevating every student, every day, to attend the best high schools and colleges. No Excuses!

a.title: Remote Learning Student Link
a.p: Click here to access the student remote learning link.

a.title: Distance Learning - Parent Survey
a.p: In an effort to better serve you and your children at home with distance learning, we are asking every TECS family to complete a short Google Forms survey.

li.div: Thomas Edison is the best place to have your children . My oldest destiny smith has been going her since KN , all the other kids had to follow suit because of the curriculum and the knowledge that they lay on the children. Never have I pushed so h...
Great school, with an excellent principal, who knows how to relate to children.
